headline: Pentair Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend of $0.27
summary: LONDON, February 23, 2026--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR) announced today that it will pay a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.27 per share on May 1, 2026 to shareholders of record at the close of business on April 17, 2026. This is the 50th consecutive year that Pentair has increased its dividend.
